cbinstall.name: AcyMailing CB integration
cbinstall.author: Acyba
cbinstall.copyright: Copyright (C) 2009-2020 ACYBA SAS - All rights reserved.
cbinstall.description: CB plugin for AcyMailing: manage the subscription to mailing lists via CB

param.name: lists
param.label: Lists displayed on the registration form
param.description: The following selected lists will be displayed on the CB registration page if they are not selected in the field auto-subscribe to.

param.name: listschecked
param.label: Lists checked by default
param.description: The selected lists will be checked by default on your CB Registration Form. This option does only apply to visible lists as hidden lists will be always checked.

param.name: listsprofile
param.label: Lists displayed on the user profile view
param.description: The following selected lists will be displayed on the CB User profile in frontend

param.name: listsprofileback
param.label: Lists displayed on the user profile in the back office
param.description: The following selected lists will be displayed on the CB User profile in backend

param.name: updateonregister
param.label: Update user subscription on registration
param.description: Should the user's subscriptions be updated during the registration if the user already exists in AcyMailing?

param.name: subcaption
param.label: Subscribe Caption
param.description: Text displayed for the subscription field. If you don't specify anything, the default value will be used from the current language file

param.name: css
param.label: CSS applied on the subscription tab
param.description: You can personalize the content displayed in the tab on the user profile page

param.name: introtext
param.label: Intro Text
param.description: This text will be displayed on the profile page before the form inside a div class=acym_introtext

param.name: enabled
param.label: Directly enable the user
param.description: Directly enable the AcyMailing user on registration, regardless if the CB user is blocked.

tab.name: Mailing lists
tab.description: Enables the user to manage his subscription to the AcyMailing Mailing Lists
